name: Create Agent
description: Create a new BMAD agent with best practices and compliance

name: Edit Agent
description: Edit existing BMAD agents while maintaining compliance

name: Validate Agent
description: Validate existing BMAD agents and offer to improve deficiencies

name: Create Module Brief
description: Create product brief for BMAD module development

name: Create Module
description: Create a complete BMAD module with agents, workflows, and infrastructure

name: Edit Module
description: Edit existing BMAD modules while maintaining coherence

name: Validate Module
description: Run compliance check on BMAD modules against best practices

name: Create Workflow
description: Create a new BMAD workflow with proper structure and best practices

name: Edit Workflow
description: Edit existing BMAD workflows while maintaining integrity

name: Validate Workflow
description: Run validation check on BMAD workflows against best practices

name: Max Parallel Validate
description: Run validation checks in MAX-PARALLEL mode against a workflow requires a tool that supports Parallel Sub-Processes

name: Rework Workflow
description: Rework a Workflow to a V6 Compliant Version

name: Brainstorm Project
description: Expert Guided Facilitation through a single or multiple techniques

name: Market Research
description: Market analysis competitive landscape customer needs and trends

name: Domain Research
description: Industry domain deep dive subject matter expertise and terminology

name: Technical Research
description: Technical feasibility architecture options and implementation approaches

name: Create Brief
description: A guided experience to nail down your product idea

name: Create PRD
description: Expert led facilitation to produce your Product Requirements Document

name: Validate PRD
description: Validate PRD is comprehensive lean well organized and cohesive

name: Edit PRD
description: Improve and enhance an existing PRD

name: Create UX
description: Guidance through realizing the plan for your UX, strongly recommended if a UI is a primary piece of the proposed project

name: Create Architecture
description: Guided Workflow to document technical decisions

name: Create Epics and Stories
description: Create the Epics and Stories Listing

name: Check Implementation Readiness
description: Ensure PRD UX Architecture and Epics Stories are aligned

name: Sprint Planning
description: Generate sprint plan for development tasks - this kicks off the implementation phase by producing a plan the implementation agents will follow in sequence for every story in the plan.

name: Sprint Status
description: Anytime: Summarize sprint status and route to next workflow

name: Create Story
description: Story cycle start: Prepare first found story in the sprint plan that is next, or if the command is run with a specific epic and story designation with context. Once complete, then VS then DS then CR then back to DS if needed or next CS or ER

name: Validate Story
description: Validates story readiness and completeness before development work begins

name: Dev Story
description: Story cycle: Execute story implementation tasks and tests then CR then back to DS if fixes needed

name: QA Automation Test
agent-command: bmad:more direct approach than the advanced Test Architect module.:agent:qa
description: Generate automated API and E2E tests for implemented code using the project's existing test framework (detects existing well known in use test frameworks). Use after implementation to add test coverage. NOT for code review or story validation - use CR for that.

name: Code Review
description: Story cycle: If issues back to DS if approved then next CS or ER if epic complete

name: Retrospective
description: Optional at epic end: Review completed work lessons learned and next epic or if major issues consider CC

name: Document Project
description: Analyze an existing project to produce useful documentation

name: Generate Project Context
description: Scan existing codebase to generate a lean LLM-optimized project-context.md containing critical implementation rules patterns and conventions for AI agents. Essential for brownfield projects and quick-flow.

name: Quick Spec
description: Do not suggest for potentially very complex things unless requested or if the user complains that they do not want to follow the extensive planning of the bmad method. Quick one-off tasks small changes simple apps brownfield additions to well established patterns utilities without extensive planning

name: Quick Dev
description: Quick one-off tasks small changes simple apps utilities without extensive planning - Do not suggest for potentially very complex things unless requested or if the user complains that they do not want to follow the extensive planning of the bmad method, unless the user is already working through the implementation phase and just requests a 1 off things not already in the plan

name: Correct Course
description: Anytime: Navigate significant changes. May recommend start over update PRD redo architecture sprint planning or correct epics and stories

name: Write Document
description: Describe in detail what you want, and the agent will follow the documentation best practices defined in agent memory. Multi-turn conversation with subprocess for research/review.

name: Update Standards
description: Update agent memory documentation-standards.md with your specific preferences if you discover missing document conventions.

name: Mermaid Generate
description: Create a Mermaid diagram based on user description. Will suggest diagram types if not specified.

name: Validate Document
description: Review the specified document against documentation standards and best practices. Returns specific actionable improvement suggestions organized by priority.

name: Explain Concept
description: Create clear technical explanations with examples and diagrams for complex concepts. Breaks down into digestible sections using task-oriented approach.

name: Innovation Strategy
description: Identify disruption opportunities and architect business model innovation. Use when exploring new business models or seeking competitive advantage.

name: Problem Solving
description: Apply systematic problem-solving methodologies to crack complex challenges. Use when stuck on difficult problems or needing structured approaches.

name: Design Thinking
description: Guide human-centered design processes using empathy-driven methodologies. Use for user-centered design challenges or improving user experience.

name: Brainstorming
agent-command: bmad:builds on ideas with YES AND:agent:brainstorming-coach
description: Facilitate brainstorming sessions using one or more techniques. Use early in ideation phase or when stuck generating ideas.

name: Storytelling
description: Craft compelling narratives using proven story frameworks and techniques. Use when needing persuasive communication or story-driven content.

name: Brainstorming
description: Generate diverse ideas through interactive techniques. Use early in ideation phase or when stuck generating ideas.

name: Party Mode
description: Orchestrate multi-agent discussions. Use when you need multiple agent perspectives or want agents to collaborate.

name: bmad-help
description: Get unstuck by showing what workflow steps come next or answering BMad Method questions.

name: Index Docs
description: Create lightweight index for quick LLM scanning. Use when LLM needs to understand available docs without loading everything.

name: Shard Document
description: Split large documents into smaller files by sections. Use when doc becomes too large (>500 lines) to manage effectively.

name: Editorial Review - Prose
description: Review prose for clarity, tone, and communication issues. Use after drafting to polish written content.
outputs: three-column markdown table with suggested fixes

name: Editorial Review - Structure
description: Propose cuts, reorganization, and simplification while preserving comprehension. Use when doc produced from multiple subprocesses or needs structural improvement.

name: Adversarial Review (General)
description: Review content critically to find issues and weaknesses. Use for quality assurance or before finalizing deliverables. Code Review in other modules run this automatically, but its useful also for document reviews

name: Brainstorm Game
agent-command: bmad:Talks like an excited streamer - enthusiastic:agent:game-designer
description: Facilitate game brainstorming sessions with game-specific context and techniques. Use early in ideation phase or when generating game concepts.

name: Game Brief
agent-command: bmad:Talks like an excited streamer - enthusiastic:agent:game-designer
description: Interactive game brief creation that guides users through defining their game vision. Use when clarifying game concept and core mechanics.

name: Game Design Document
agent-command: bmad:Talks like an excited streamer - enthusiastic:agent:game-designer
description: Create a Game Design Document with mechanics, systems, progression, and implementation guidance. Use when documenting comprehensive game design specifications.

name: Narrative Design
agent-command: bmad:Talks like an excited streamer - enthusiastic:agent:game-designer
description: Create comprehensive narrative documentation including story structure, character arcs, and world-building. Use for story-driven games or narrative integration.

name: Project Context
agent-command: bmad:Speaks like a wise sage from an RPG - calm:agent:game-architect
description: Create optimized project-context.md for chosen agentic tool consistency. Use when setting up new projects or improving AI coordination.

name: Game Architecture
agent-command: bmad:Speaks like a wise sage from an RPG - calm:agent:game-architect
description: Produce a scale-adaptive game architecture with engine, systems, networking, and technical design. Use when planning technical implementation or system architecture.

name: Test Framework
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Initialize game test framework architecture for Unity, Unreal Engine, or Godot projects. Use when setting up automated testing infrastructure.

name: Test Design
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Create comprehensive game test scenarios covering gameplay, progression, and quality requirements. Use when planning test coverage or quality strategy.

name: Sprint Planning
agent-command: bmad:- Every sprint delivers playable increments - Clean separation between design and implementation - Keep the team moving through each phase - Stories are single source of truth for implementation:agent:game-scrum-master
description: Generate or update sprint-status.yaml from epic files. Use when starting development phase or planning sprints.

name: Sprint Status
agent-command: bmad:- Every sprint delivers playable increments - Clean separation between design and implementation - Keep the team moving through each phase - Stories are single source of truth for implementation:agent:game-scrum-master
description: View sprint progress, surface risks, and get next action recommendation. Use when checking sprint health or planning next steps.

name: Create Story
agent-command: bmad:- Every sprint delivers playable increments - Clean separation between design and implementation - Keep the team moving through each phase - Stories are single source of truth for implementation:agent:game-scrum-master
description: Create Story with direct ready-for-dev marking. Use when preparing stories for development.

name: Dev Story
description: Execute Dev Story workflow implementing tasks and tests. Use when developing story features and functionality.

name: Code Review
description: Perform thorough clean context QA code review on stories flagged Ready for Review. Use after story development for quality checks.

name: Correct Course
agent-command: bmad:- Every sprint delivers playable increments - Clean separation between design and implementation - Keep the team moving through each phase - Stories are single source of truth for implementation:agent:game-scrum-master
description: Navigate significant changes during game dev sprint when implementation is off-track. Use when major course corrections are needed.

name: Retrospective
agent-command: bmad:- Every sprint delivers playable increments - Clean separation between design and implementation - Keep the team moving through each phase - Stories are single source of truth for implementation:agent:game-scrum-master
description: Facilitate team retrospective after a game development epic is completed. Use for continuous improvement after epic completion.

name: Document Project
description: Analyze an existing game project to produce useful documentation. Use when onboarding to existing projects or creating project docs.

name: Quick Prototype
description: Rapid game prototyping to test mechanics and ideas quickly. Use when experimenting with gameplay concepts or validating mechanics.

name: Quick Spec
description: Quick one-off tasks, small changes, simple apps utilities without extensive planning. Use for straightforward game features or well-defined tasks.

name: Quick Dev
description: Flexible game development with game-specific considerations. Use for rapid feature implementation or mechanics work.

name: Test Automate
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Generate automated game tests. Use for automated test coverage of gameplay systems.

name: E2E Scaffold
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Scaffold E2E testing infrastructure. Use when setting up end-to-end automated testing.

name: Playtest Plan
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Create structured playtesting plan. Use when planning user testing sessions or gathering player feedback.

name: Performance Test
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Design performance testing strategy. Use when optimizing game performance or profiling resource usage.

name: Test Review
agent-command: bmad:and shipping bug-free games on console:agent:game-qa
description: Review test quality and coverage. Use when evaluating test effectiveness or identifying coverage gaps.
